content:
ITransientErrorDetectionStrategy ITransientErrorDetectionStrategy Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.NetStandard.dll

Defines an interface that must be implemented by custom components responsible for detecting specific transient conditions.

Edit

In this Article

public interface ITransientErrorDetectionStrategyPublic Interface ITransientErrorDetectionStrategy

Methods

IsTransient(Exception) IsTransient(Exception)

Edit

Determines whether the specified exception represents a transient failure that can be compensated by a retry.

bool IsTransient(Exception ex)Function IsTransient(ex As Exception) As Boolean
Parameters
ex
Exception Exception

The exception object to be verified.

Returns
Boolean Boolean

true if the specified exception is considered as transient; otherwise, false.
